247.description: Destroy any minion damaged by this minion.

249.name: Ancient of War

256.name: Earth Shock

266.name: Cone of Cold

271.name: Azure Drake

276.name: Ragnaros the Firelord

294.name: Lord Jaraxxus

367.name: Bite

374.name: Mana Tide Totem

396.name: Snipe

404.name: Equality

405.name: Molten Giant

407.name: Fade
407.cndescription: 使你的仆从获得嘲讽。抽1张牌。
